message.content:
To get to the grocery store that is 1km away in Costa Rica, you have a few options:

1. Walking: If the weather is pleasant and you enjoy walking, you can simply walk to the grocery store. It will take you approximately 10-15 minutes to cover a distance of 1km.

2. Bicycling: If you have a bicycle or can rent one, cycling to the grocery store can be a convenient and eco-friendly option. It will take you around 5-10 minutes to reach your destination.

3. Public transportation: Depending on the availability of public transportation in your area, you can check if there are buses or taxis that can take you to the grocery store. Buses are a common mode of transportation in Costa Rica and are relatively affordable.

4. Driving: If you have access to a car or can rent one, driving to the grocery store is another option. It will be a short drive of around 5 minutes, considering the distance is only 1km.

Consider the available options based on your preferences, convenience, and the resources at your disposal.
